rows.label: qev065405_MSG0001
rows.name:
Your methods are soft! You risk destroying the bond of
trust we have built up over long years of work![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0002
rows.name:
The Ganglion have faith in Definian spies above all
others for a reason—I will not let you compromise that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0003
rows.name: But that is myopic! My methods are sound.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0004
rows.name:
There is intelligence that cannot be acquired save by
blending in with humankind, earning their trust,
and understanding their ways.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0005
rows.name: Is that not the ideal to which any spy should aspire?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0006
rows.name: I have simply been putting it into practice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0007
rows.name: And in the process, you have grown attached to them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0008
rows.name: What...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0009
rows.name:
You've immersed yourself in their society for too long.
It has tainted you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0010
rows.name:
To be entrusted with a mission as grand as infiltrating
and destroying the human stronghold from the inside...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0011
rows.name: Any Definian would be thrilled to earn such trust...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0012
rows.name: And then you betray us like this?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0013
rows.name: I... I haven't...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0014
rows.name:
Then why do you struggle for words? If you hold no
love for humans and remain loyal to the Ganglion,
why do you not deny these claims outright?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0015
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0016
rows.name: Hmph. You have no response because there isn't one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0017
rows.name: I take your silence as confirmation of your betrayal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0018
rows.name:
You are relieved of your mission to destroy humanity.
I will take over from this point![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0019
rows.name: Dieara, wait![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0020
rows.name: Don't worry, dear Erio. I am not without mercy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0021
rows.name:
I will allow you to die as a Definian—to rest eternal
in your true form.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0022
rows.name: Rrrrgh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0023
rows.name: ...Well, in good time, at any rate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0024
rows.name:
But before we can resolve our differences,
it seems we have an interruption to deal with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0025
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0026
rows.name:
It appears that your beloved humans have finally pieced
it all together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev065405_MSG0027
rows.name:
So I will deal with you just as soon as we've buried
this fool![ST:wait ]
